airportConditionDefinitions.text: ATC LOW VISIBILITY PROCEDURES IN OPERATION. CATERGORY THREE HOLDING POINTS IN USE.
INCREASED BIRD ACTIVITY WITHIN THE AERODROME BOUNDARY.
LARGE FLOCKS OF BIRDS HAVE BEEN OBSERVED WITHIN THE VICINITY OF THE AERODROME.
TURBULENCE MAY BE ENCOUNTERED IN THE FINAL STAGES OF THE APPROACH.
WINDSHEAR REPORTED.
BE ADVISED MODERATE MICRO-BURST FORECAST.
FLIGHT CREWS ARE REMINDED TO USE MINIMUM RUNWAY OCCUPANCY.
FOR CLEARANCE CONTACT DELIVERY ON 121.955.
DELIVERY IS CLOSED, ATC CONTINUES WITH GROUND ON 121.730.
DELIVERY AND GROUND ARE CLOSED, ATC CONTINUES WITH TOWER ON 123.805.
DATALINK CLEARANCES ARE AVAILABLE.
FLIGHT CREWS THAT ARE IN RECEIPT OF DATALINK CLEARANCES ARE REMINDED THAT THEY MUST CONTACT DELIVERY ON 121.955 WHEN READY FOR START.
REPORT IF YOU ARE UNABLE TO USE THE EAST AND WEST TAXI LINES ON FIRST CONTACT.
ONLY CALL FOR PUSH ONCE THE TUG IS CONNECTED AND READY TO GO.
